subject: Football
Sports Injuries
Fireworks
Accidents and Safety
Football
lead_paragraph: The Giants and Pierre-Paul, who had his right index finger amputated after a fireworks accident, came to terms on a new contract that will put the one-time rising star back on the practice field.
snippet: The Giants and Pierre-Paul, who had his right index finger amputated after a fireworks accident, came to terms on a new contract that will put the one-time rising star back on the practice field.
